Text:

If there's anything wrong with them, let me know!  Enjoy! :D

"searching for people with this file"

Has it died already?

Here's an updated version of the subtitle file: http://www.filedropper.com/metropolis-restoredversion-arte-12-2-2010_1

I fixed one of the subtitles (the caption from Freder's book, "The Book of Revelations") not showing up due to a typo in the timecode and tweaked a few other timecodes.  I also fixed several typos in the text.
The preceding programme and subsequent documentary can be found here - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5365729/

FAN-FRIGGIN-TASTIC!!!  The only film that's been possibly more influential than Citizen Kane on modern cinema.

Just one question, how do I attach the Eng subtitle file to the .avi?

The NY Times story today is probably going to lead to a lot more hits now.
@Mr. Radar: Filedropper doesn't work anymore (at least not for me). Could you upload the subs elsewhere?
Beautiful quality! Thanks Vic. Just a tyro question: how do I apply the English subtitle  .srt,  which is offered by Radar?
Excellent quality and nice live music, plus working and truthfull subtitles, thank you very much! Now I have to get thru the two additional Arte documentaries without subs:)
